channel.title: Oringinal Xbox Video Card?
channel.description:
Is it possible for the original xbox's video card be taken out of the system and put into my computer?
IDK if this can go on mopar forums but this is general chat so i figured i would ask If this is not aloud on here can a mod plz lock or delete this.
Get back asap plz Thanks

item.title: Oringinal Xbox Video Card?
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

The GPU is obviously soldered onto the motherboard so there is no card. But you can use your original xbox as a computer by running linux on it. http://www.xbox-linux.org/ for more information.

But it is a tedious procedure since the hard drive is locked and the xbox actually has a weak cpu performance.

Read full topic

item.title: Oringinal Xbox Video Card?
item.dc:creator: @Cuban0_Ftw Cuban0 Ftw
item.description:
@Cuban0_Ftw wrote:

Before they lock it, no don’t do it. It would fry your computer.

Read full topic
